name: The Dancer - Art Pendant
description:
This pendant features a beautiful vintage painting of a dancing woman. The image is printed on Hahnemuhle Baryta fine art paper and set in hand-soldered pewter, then coated with a thick layer of resin for a beautiful shine.

This pendant measure approximately 2 1/4 inches tall by a little over an inch wide. (5.7 x 2.85cm). The colors are soft and muted but very striking and able to match with a lot of different colors and clothes.

name: Margherite Photo Art Pendant
description:
This pendant was made using one of my original photographs of daisies floating in water. It measures 1.5 by 1.5 inches.

The image is printed on Hahnemuhle Baryta 325gsm paper, and set in hand soldered pewter, then coated with a thick layer of resin.

Your pendant ships in a protective bag in a padded envelope by US Priority mail, FREE in the USA.

name: Peacock - Art Pendant
description:
This colorful pendant uses a vintage image
advertising congac. I don't know what peacocks have to do with cognac but it looks good all the same.

This image is printed on Hahnemuhle Baryta fine art paper and set in hand-soldered pewter. A deep coat of resin gives a glass like finish and shine to the pendant.

The pendant measure approximately 1 x 1.5 inches (2.54 x 3.8 cm), is richly colored and goes great with any casual outfit.

Your pendant arrives in a protective bag in a padded envelope by US Priority mail. FREE shipping in the USA, and just $2 for international

name: Renaissance Blue - Art Pendant
description:
This beautiful painting from the 1500's is printed on Hahnemuhle Baryta paper and set in a hand-soldered peweter setting, then coated in resin.

It measures 1.5 x 1.5 inches (3.8 x 3.8 cm) with very striking, rich colors. 

Your pendant is shipped in a protective bag inside a padded envelope by US Priority mail. Domestic US shipping is FREE, international shipping is just $2.

name: Magazzini Italiani - Art Pendant
description:
This striking orange and blue pendant is from a vintage Italian poster advertising fashion.

This pendant measure 1.25 x 1.25 inches (3.18 x 3.18cm) which is a great size - very noticeable but small enough to wear comfortably.

This image is printed on Hahnemuhle Baryta paper in a hand soldered pewter setting, then coated in resin. 

Your pendant is shipped in a protective bag in a padded envelope with US Priority mail. Shipping is FREE in the USA, and just $2 for international orders.
